  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioJack
    An individual audio jack.
    Jack

    An individual MIDI jack.
    MultiJack
    This is the abstract base class for multi-jacks.
    PolyJack
    An individual poly jack.
    SamplerVoice
    A sampler voice with pitch and filter modulation.
    SamplerVoiceProgram
    A simple class detailing a sampler voice program.
    SamplerVoiceProgram.SampleInfo
    A simple voice containing sample data, the buffer and sample rate.
    Values
    Constants and helpful functions.
    VoltageAnalogVUMeter
    Analog VU meter class complete with moving needle!

    Class representing an audio bus.
    VoltageAudioCable
    Class representing an audio cable.
    VoltageAudioDevice
    Read and write to and from audio devices.
    VoltageAudioJack
    This is a multi-jack of audio/cv jacks.
    VoltageButton
    Your standard button class.
    VoltageCable
    Abstract class representing a cable.
    VoltageCanvas
    An object in which you can custom draw on and accept mouse input
    VoltageClassLoader
    A class used to load Voltage classes.
    VoltageComponent
    VoltageComponent is the base class for knobs, sliders, buttons and other controls.
    VoltageCurve
    Curve class
    VoltageDigitalCounter
    A class to show a digital clock type display.
    VoltageEllipse
    A class to draw circles or ellipses.
    VoltageImage
    Display images and animations
    VoltageKeyboard
    A virtual keyboard control
    VoltageKeyPressInfo
    VoltageKeyPressInfo provides information about a key-press event, including the key code of the key that was pressed, the character for that key (if valid), various helper functions to identify specialized key presses like escape, return, etc., and information about what modifier keys were down during the key press (shift, alt, etc.) A VoltageKeyPressInfo object gets passed as the 'object' parameter to Notify() during a Key_Press notification.
    VoltageKnob
    Knobs - the staple of modular systems.
    VoltageLabel
    A label class
    VoltageLED
    A simple LED
    VoltageLine
    Line class with optional arrow head.
    VoltageMidiBus
    Class representing a MIDI bus.
    VoltageMidiCable
    Class representing an MIDI cable.
    VoltageMidiJack
    This is a multi-jack of MIDI jacks.
    VoltageModule
    The base class for your module.
    VoltageMouseKeyFlags
    VoltageMouseKeyFlags provides information about which keys were pressed and mouse buttons were down during a given mouse event.
    VoltageObjects
    ((Internal global data structure not for module developers.))
    VoltageObjects.MIDIEvent
    Constains a MIDI message with a sample time.
    VoltagePluginHost
    Control to host plugins.
    VoltagePluginHost.MidiMessageWithSampleOffset
    Constains a MIDI message with a sample time.

    Some global utility functions.

    A 2-state toggle button.
